thread.section_title: Woman who faked being black changes name to Nkechi Diallo meaning ‘gift of god’ – Metro
thread.title: Woman who faked being black changes name to Nkechi Diallo meaning ‘gift of god’
thread.title_full: Woman who faked being black changes name to Nkechi Diallo meaning ‘gift of god’

author: Richard Hartley-Parkinson
title: Woman who faked being black changes name to Nkechi Diallo meaning ‘gift of god’
text:
Ruthanne and Larry Dolezal, Rachel’s parents She told the Guardian that the only work she has been offered is reality TV and porn.
Dolezal has acknowledged that she is ‘Caucasian biologically,’ but says she identifies as black.
She said that she ‘began to see the world through black eyes’ as a teenager after her parents adopted four black children. Dolezal says she decided to be publicly black years later following a divorce.
Dolezal maintains that she did nothing wrong.
